Class Validation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Validation
  • public class Validation
extends java.lang.Object
    Valdiation class helpds validate all the requiremenets specified such as registration number , colour of the car, model of the car and so on. We are using static methods for verification which can be called anywhere in the program. If the condition is true then boolean is returned and program is further executed else false is returned and neccesary actions are taken.
    Version:
    (v3, 27th May 2021)
    Author:
    (Kapish Kuchroo)

    • Method Detail

      • validateCar

        public static boolean validateCar​(java.lang.String registrationNumberCar,
                                  int yearMadeCar,
                                  java.lang.String[] colourOfCar,
                                  java.lang.String makerOfCar,
                                  java.lang.String modelOfCar,
                                  int priceOfCar)
        Static method available to validate the inputs for a car object. This method is a class method and available to all the other classes.
        Parameters:
        registrationNumberCar - registration number of car
        yearMadeCar - car made year
        colourOfCar - colours of car in an array
        makerOfCar - String maker of car
        modelOfCar - String model of car
        priceOfCar - price of car
        Returns:
        boolean (true or false)
